attributes.action: not permit serious offenders anonymity on their release.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is talk of Baby P's mother being granted lifetime anonymity on her release from prison. This would cost the taxpayer a great deal of money. She, and others like her, should have to take their chances.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/A-New-Identity/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
